definition: خفر kafara u (kafr, خفارة kifāra) to watch (هـ, ه s.o., s.th. or over s.o., over s.th.), guard, protect (ه s.o., هـ s.th.); -- kafira a (kafar, خفارة kafāra) to be timid, shy, bashful II = I kafara V = I kafira خفر kafr watching, watch, guard(ing) خفر kafar guard detachment, guard; escort │ خفر السواحل coast guard (Eg.) خفر kafar timidity, shyness, bashfulness, diffidence خفر kafir bashful, diffident, timid, shy, embarrassed, coy
